column1:
Add Quick Shop buttons to products list automatically.
However, you can also use
echo $this->helper('Emthemes\QuickShop\Helper\Data')
->getQuickShopButton($_product)
to customize your template.
column2:
Add Quick Shop buttons to products list automatically.
However, you can also use
echo $this->helper('Emthemes\QuickShop\Helper\Data')
->getQuickShopButton($_product)
to customize your template.

column1: Use comma (,) to separate different item class. Default is .product-item
column2: Use comma (,) to separate different item class. Default is .product-item

column1: The element CSS class that Quick Shop button will be appended to. Default is .product-item-info.
column2: The element CSS class that Quick Shop button will be appended to. Default is .product-item-info.
